definition: to lift up (sth hanging down)/to raise (hem of skirt)/to pull up (sleeve)/to sprinkle (water with cupped hands)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Inadvertently, provoke hair with his hand, give rise to cracking and spluttering noise.
sentences.chinese: 不經意間，用手撩動頭髮，還會產生劈里啪啦的響聲。

sentences.english: Caressing your cascading long hair, singing a love song in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 把你那如瀑的長髮輕輕撩動，爲你唱一曲風的戀歌。

sentences.english: The romanticism of the bar enrich the night life of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 有浪漫的情懷，撩動夜的上海。

sentences.english: I know its crazy but you still can touch my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我知道這很瘋狂，但你仍能撩動我的心絃。

sentences.english: The romanticism of the bar enriches the night life of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 有浪漫的情懷，撩動夜的上海。

sentences.english: Carry the exciting item around the store for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 攜帶那些撩動人心的物品在商場裏晃悠15分鐘。

sentences.english: If I've never been decadent, you won't feel my sense;
sentences.chinese: 如果不曾幻想過，你就不會撩動我的心聲。
